author: emmanuel
name: EnhancedMinty
description:
This theme is an evolution of the really nice Minty theme.
It is supposed to be compatible with Cinnamon 2.0.

Feel free to comment and modify it. Please comment if you see something broken or something you want to see changed.

 

Change :

1.2 : removed transition times to make everything faster.

1.3 : minor correction in code
